name: Dragon Quest Monsters: Joker 2 Professional
description:
'Dragon Quest Monsters: Joker 2 Professional' (otherwise known as ドラゴンクエストモンスターズ ジョーカー2 プロフェッショナル) is a revamped and expanded version of its original title, 'Dragon Quest Monsters: Joker 2'. Despite its original entry garnering large attraction out of region, this edition of Joker 2 was only made available in Japan on 31st March, 2011. On the bright side, fan-translations have been made to account for this.

The revamped version of the game shares the same storyline of its initial entry, although it does stray with adding extra sequences. In addition to that, there's a few visual changes players of the original may notice, such as the protagonist's clothing changing from red to blue. There are new maps to explore, with more items to collect and craft.

As a call back to previous titles of the Dragon Quest series, and as a bonus incentive to pick up the game, the game also includes 100 new monsters to find and synthesize. Most of which come from the recent 'Dragon Quest IX' and 'Dragon Quest Heroes: Rocket Slime' titles at the time. To go in par with that, there's a new "final-final" boss for players to seek out- which can prove a challenging opponent compared to other bosses before it!
